name: Tommy Guchi
description:
Meanwhile, at the Blumsy corp ©, Tommy Guchi, the notorious scientist, was on the verge of a breakthough of cosmic proportions !

Under his microscope, a genetically enhanced breed of bacteria was painfuly multiplying. Yet an unfortunate budget cut made said microscope shoot electricity is not properly handled. 

Help Tommy Guchy maintain those miserable creatures alive through careful and metodical scientific gallivanting !

A peacefull and relaxing game lol lmao wtf

A little game made for the Trijam #122 Transformation/Micro things.

The goal was to made a game in 3h, here are our respective production time :

Miguel Prud’hom 4h30 : character design and animation

Guibal Adrien 3h : Background UI

Fukuma Nausicaa 4h30 : character design and animation

Liette Robin 3h : music and sound design

Konrad Banti 4h30 : dev on Unity
